coffeeItems.name: Espresso
coffeeItems.description: A full-flavored, concentrated form of coffee that is served in “shots”.

coffeeItems.name: Latte
coffeeItems.description: Made with espresso and steamed milk, the latte is a classic coffee favorite.

coffeeItems.name: Cappuccino
coffeeItems.description: A coffee drink that is made with espresso, hot milk, and steamed milk foam.

coffeeItems.name: Americano
coffeeItems.description: Espresso with added hot water, giving it a similar strength but different flavor from regular drip coffee.
